channel.title: Boldness be my friend.
channel.description: Recent content on Boldness be my friend.

item.title: Linear Classifier
item.description: Starting with the linear classifier Model Linear classifier computes scores $s = W x$ for $k$ different visual categories given the image, where $W$ was a matrix and $x$ was an input column vector containing all pixel data of the image. In the case of CIFAR-10, $x$ is a [3072x1] column vector, and $W$ is a [10x3072] matrix, so that the output scores is a vector of 10 class scores.

item.title: Medical RL
item.description: A data-driven approach to health care using RL, creating new tools to aid dynamic treatments decision.

item.title: Statistics + Computation
item.description: Modern statistical estimation and inference for large-scale data.

item.title: Tensors
item.description: Explore statistical methods with theoretical guarantees for tensor observations.
